programme.title: Peston
programme.desc: Robert and Pippa are joined by Chief Secretary to the PM Darren Jones, broadcaster Piers Morgan, Labours Becky Long-Bailey and Conservative Sir Jacob Rees-Mogg.

programme.title: Lingo
programme.desc: Vetting their vocabularies this time are siblings Nad and Rusha from London, Michelle and her son Paul from Manchester, and mates Lisa and Lisa from Sandbach.

programme.title: Deal or No Deal
programme.desc: Stephen Mulhern hosts as Dami takes to the hot seat and hopes to beat the tight-fisted Banker at his own game.

programme.desc: Bradley Walsh and his criminally clever Chaser are back as Karl, Mehrin, Lucy and Matt hope that they can beat a Chaser together and leave with thousands of pounds.

programme.desc: What is Takotsubo cardiomyopathy, and what impact does it have? Aberdeen University researchers have completed the worlds first clinical trial to help patients recover.

programme.desc: Lewis abandons his work, Charitys plan fails, and Bear anxiously tends to Anya.

programme.desc: As shoplifting rates hit the highest ever recorded in the UK, Paul Brand speaks to those affected and investigates what is being done to tackle the problem.
